abstract: America, for all its mistakes in Iraq, at least has the comfort of knowing that it has done pretty much all it could do, within the limits of popular acceptance of the costs in blood and treasure, to open the way for a better Iraqi future.
snippet: America, for all its mistakes in Iraq, at least has the comfort of knowing that it has done pretty much all it could do, within the limits of popular acceptance of the costs in blood and treasure, to open the way for a better Iraqi future.

headline.main: A Complicated Close for U.S. in Iraq
